目标函数  
return px11 * x1 ** 2 + px22 * x2 ** 2 \
           + px33 * x3 ** 2 + pt1 * t1 + pt2 * t2 \
           + px1 * x1 + px2 * x2 + px3 * x3 + px12 * x1 * x2 \
           + px13 * x1 * x3 + px23 * x2 * x3 + px00


高钾二氧化硅
px11, px22, px33, pt1, pt2, px1, px2, px3, px12, px13, px23, px00 =
[-6.96227165e-02  1.64070120e-01 -3.08639531e-01  1.80000000e+01
  1.15445188e+02  1.07451203e+00 -3.99061814e+00  3.66817947e+00
  3.44170377e-02 -1.63095321e-01  1.39658507e-01  7.38456064e+01]
